As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I have decided to grant your request for a loan. I trust that you pay the sum back within a reasonable time and as soon as you are able.

Praise be to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your generous gift to the Order shall not be forgotten. The money will come to good use in the defense against those who threaten the true faith. 

Praise be to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. I trust you send me the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold as soon as you receive this letter.

Praise be to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. If you cannot spare the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold, I have another suggestion. The order is in unending need of champions and your [child_offer.GetRootRelation] [child_offer.GetFirstName] would make an excellent addition to our ranks.

Praise be to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. If you cannot spare the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold, I have another suggestion. If you allow us to build a castle in [castle_offer.GetName] and aid us in its construction, your debt shall be forgotten.

Praise be to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]

Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and I are still deep in conversation. We are talking about religion, righteousness, how to do the right thing. [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] suggests that giving alms and fasting must surely bring mortals closer to the divine.

Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet I and [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] are still deep in conversation. We are discussing a hadith [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] just read. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] suggest that its narrator, Abu Hurairah, might be unreliable and asks if the hadiths recorded by Ali are not preferable.

I approached [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast last night, intending to figure out whether [assassins_recruitee.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. We had a long, deep conversation and it seems like [assassins_recruitee.GetFirstName] is of sound opinions!

Last night I approached [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast, intending to figure out whether [assassins_recruitee.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. Unfortunately, as soon I steered the conversation towards the topics of the Prophet and his rightful heir, Ali, the narrow-minded [assassins_recruitee.GetManWoman] became quite disagreeable...

Last night I approached [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast, intending to figure out whether [assassins_recruitee.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. Unfortunately, as soon I steered the conversation towards the topics of the [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], the narrow-minded [assassins_recruitee.GetManWoman] became quite disagreeable...

Since I had such a good time a few weeks back, I invited [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] to share an informal meal. Yet again the conversation found its way to the topic of religion and righteousness. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] expressed [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] admiration for those willing to give their life fighting for their beliefs.

Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and I are still deep in conversation. We are talking about religion, righteousness, how to do the right thing. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] expresses [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] admiration for those willing to give their life fighting for their beliefs.

I was just about to draft an invitation when [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName] invited me to dine with [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHim]. We talked for many hours, even as the plates were emptied and the cups drained. As I praised those willing to die for their faith, [assassins_recruitee.GetFirstName] agreed wholeheartedly, wishing [assassins_recruitee.GetSheHe] could be more like them.

I was just about to draft an invitation when [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName] invited you to dine with [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHim]. The conversation flowed easily and [assassins_recruitee.GetFirstName] expressed many admirable sentiments. However, when I mentioned those willing to die for their beliefs, [assassins_recruitee.GetSheHe] sneered and condemned "such fanatics".

We are quiet for a moment, both seemingly contemplating these devoted souls. Then [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] looks up at me, a curious intensity in [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] gaze. "That is not an impossible wish, [Root.GetFirstName]. Are you ready to kill and, if He wills it, get killed to defend the words of His Prophet and the rightful heir?"

We are quiet for a moment, both seemingly contemplating these devoted souls. Then [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] looks up at me, a curious intensity in [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] gaze. "That is not an impossible wish, [Root.GetFirstName]. Are you ready to kill and, if They will it, get killed to defend the words of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]?"

When I suggested there is a way for [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName] to serve the greater good, [assassins_recruitee.GetSheHe] only scoffed dismissively and changed the subject. Judging by the look [assassins_recruitee.GetSheHe] gave me as I left, however, it seems as if [assassins_recruitee.GetFirstName] is not so oblivious after all...

When I suggested there is a way for [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName] to serve the greater good, [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHis] eyes lit up with a glimmer of hope. "I am ready, [Root.GetFirstName]. Please, if it is true, will you set me on this path?"

I do, [Root.GetFirstName], says [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] with a solemn, almost ceremonial, voice. "There is an Order devoted to Allah and the rightful Caliph. One that defends those true of faith and bring vengeance to their persecutors. The Assassins are always in need of champions. Think it over, and someone might reach out..."

I do, [Root.GetFirstName], says [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] with a solemn, almost ceremonial, voice. "There is an Order devoted to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]. One that defends those true of faith and bring vengeance to their persecutors. The Assassins are always in need of champions. Think it over, and someone might reach out..."

My eyes open, seeing only darkness. For a moment, my mind is blank, before the first thoughts get through the haze of sleep. Why did I wake up? A deep [Root.GetManWoman]'s voice cuts through the silence, startling me. "The time has come for you to profess your devoutness to Allah and the rightful imam Ali."

My eyes open, seeing only darkness. For a moment, my mind is blank, before the first thoughts get through the haze of sleep. Why did I wake up? A deep [Root.GetManWoman]'s voice cuts through the silence, startling me. "The time has come for you to profess your devoutness to [shiite.GetHighGodName]."

Excellent. I turn my head towards the voice. A hooded figure steps out of the shadows by the [Root.GetChamberOpening] and a hand appears from underneath the cloak, holding out a piece of parchment. "Before we continue, you must sign this. A written pledge of allegiance to the Grand Master of the Assassins. A routine... safety measure."

As soon as I lift the tip of the quill from the parchment the hooded [Root.GetManWoman] snatches it from the desk. "The Grand Master will be pleased, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. You will receive an invitation to our stronghold, but for now, go back to bed. You will need the rest." The next moment, [Root.GetSheHe] is gone.

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
You are hereby invited to the Assassins stronghold in [inductor_rendezvous.County.GetName]. Arrive at the [inductor_rendezvous.GetHolding] of [inductor_rendezvous.GetName] in a fortnight's time. One of our people will collect you there. Until then, keep safe, and breath not a word of this meeting to any living soul.

Praise be to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Signed, [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]

The journey to [inductor_rendezvous.GetName] was comfortable, however, the dwindling mountain path to the Assassins' stronghold was a torment to tread. As I finally arrive at the castle, my guide brings me to the main tower, where I am introduced to [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName].

There is no time for pleasantries, not even a moment to catch my breath, before [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName] leads me through another door, down a spiraling stone staircase. We descend in silence. The stair ends and the [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] opens another door, revealing a gloomy basement room and a figure kneeling on the floor.

This, [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName] says solemnly as I enter, "is your test". With these words, [assassins_inductor.GetSheHe] pulls the hood from the [assassins_sacrifice.GetManWoman]'s head. It is [assassins_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName], my [assassins_sacrifice.GetRootRelation]! The shock in [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHis] eyes must be mirroring my own. "This [assassins_sacrifice.GetManWoman] is an enemy of our faith. End [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHim]." The [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] offers me a dagger.

This, [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName] says solemnly as I enter, "is your test". With these words, [assassins_inductor.GetSheHe] pulls the hood from the [Root.GetManWoman]'s head. It is one of my servants! The shock in [Root.GetHerHis] eyes must be mirroring my own. "This [Root.GetManWoman] is an enemy of our faith. End [Root.GetHerHim]." The [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] offers me a dagger.

The blood is still gushing from the infidel's limp body as I kneel in front of the [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank]. [assassins_inductor.GetSheHeCap] recites the oath of the Assassins and I repeat after [assassins_inductor.GetHerHim]. As [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName] speaks the final words, inducting me into the order, [assassins_inductor.GetSheHe] smears the blood across my cheeks. "Stand up, Adherent [Root.GetFirstName]. Welcome to the Assassins."

There is no time to think. As I accept the dagger from [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName] I sink it into [assassins_inductor.GetHerHis] stomach. I free my intended victim and drag [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHim] after me, up the stairs, without looking back once. You just keep running. By some miracle, no one intervenes.

I turn around and run. [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]'s footsteps get closer behind me and as I reach the top of the stairs, [assassins_inductor.GetSheHe] grips a fistful of my mantle, pulling you down on top of [assassins_inductor.GetHerHis]. Vertigo. Crippling pain. Blind, manic frenzy. By some miracle, you manage to free yourself. You are alive. But for how much longer?

There is no time to think. As I accept the dagger from [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName] I stab at [assassins_inductor.GetHerHim], without a moment's hesitation. The blade strikes only air. [assassins_inductor.GetSheHeCap] moves too quickly. I am on the floor, trapped under the weight of [assassins_inductor.GetHerHis] body. I plead for my life as [assassins_inductor.GetSheHe] wrestles the weapon from my hand.

The look on [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]'s face is pure disappointment. "We had high hopes for you, [Root.GetFirstName], although it seems we were mistaken." I swallow. Loudly. "This cowardice makes you useless to us. Your gold, on the other hand..." As I leave, my intended victim in tow, my hands will not stop shaking.

You have no idea what happened as you wake up on the floor of your [Root.GetChamber], a taste of blood in your mouth and a pounding ache along the side of your face. Slowly, the memories come back. A hooded [Root.GetManWoman]... The Assassins. Perhaps you should consider yourself lucky, getting away with only a black eye.

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The recruit you sent us, [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName], has now completed [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHis] induction into the order. I thank you for this contribution – it will not be forgotten.

Praise be to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The recruit you sent us, [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName], proved to be disaster. We have spent significant resources in our attempt to induct [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHim], all for naught. This lack of judgment will be remembered.

Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]

After having relentlessly studied [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s habits and movements, I finally believe I have found the perfect opportunity for the grand spectacle that will be [plot_target.GetHerHis] death. In a week's time, when [plot_target.GetFirstName] leaves the [plot_target.GetHouseOfWorship] after [plot_target.GetReligiousRite]...

Not even the thick walls of [plot_target.Host.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison can protect [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] from Allah's judgment. After having spent many nights watching the rotation of the guards and studied the [plot_target.Host.GetCapitalHolding] from every angle, I think I have found my opening...

The craven [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has gone into hiding, but no walls or disguises can save [plot_target.GetHerHim] from Allah's wrath. I have identified the servant who brings [plot_target.GetHerHim] messages and last night I followed [Root.GetHerHim] all the way to [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s lair.

The thick [plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding] walls of [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName] might offer [plot_target.GetHerHim] shelter from the epidemic, but the wrath of the Assassins know no such obstacles. After having spent many nights watching the rotation of the guards and studied the [plot_target.Location.GetHolding] from every angle, I think I have found my opening...

The thick [plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding] walls of [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName] might offer [plot_target.GetHerHim] shelter from lesser dangers, but the wrath of the Assassins know no such obstacles. After having spent many nights watching the rotation of the guards and studied the [plot_target.Location.GetHolding] from every angle, I think I have found my opening...

My target, [plot_target.GetTitledName], is hosting a feast in [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName] and I have successfully infiltrated [plot_target.GetHerHis] kitchen staff. This will be spectacular...

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. In a week's time, when [plot_target.GetFirstName] leaves the [plot_target.GetHouseOfWorship] after [plot_target.GetReligiousRite], I will strike [plot_target.GetHerHim] down.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. I have found a way into the prison where [plot_target.GetSheHe] is held.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. I have discovered the den in which [plot_target.GetSheHe] is cowering.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. I have found a way into the [plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding] where [plot_target.GetSheHe] resides.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]

There is a solemn, almost reverential, atmosphere as the crowd pours out of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] after the [Root.GetReligiousRite]. I follow the flow of people absentmindedly while I ponder what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] said regarding right and wrong, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. Suddenly, I stumble. A moment later something heavy pushes me down into the dirt.

As the cell door creaks I steady myself. [Host.GetTitledFirstName]'s jailer is a brute of a [Host.GetManWoman]. However, when faint light of a distant torch reveals the silhouette in the doorway, my heart sinks from its position in my stomach to the floor. This is not the jailer. And... is that a dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand?

I open my eyes and suddenly I feel wide awake. Something is not right, I can sense it with all my being. Why is the window open...?\nThe whisper emerging from the shadows is soft as silk. "Did you think you could escape the Assassins, [Root.GetFirstName]?"

The atmosphere at court grows more strained each day, so I thought a little feast would do us all good. I am conversing with [conversationalist.GetTitledFirstName] over the main course when the loud clatter of a serving dish crashing to the floor makes me jump out of my seat. I face the clumsy servant but words fail me as I discover the dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand.

It... it is so hard to breathe. A heavy weight is pressing down on me, constricting my chest, pushing the air out of my lungs. As the worlds come in to focus I see a figure hovering over me. Is that a dagger?

I am conversing with [conversationalist.GetTitledFirstName] over the main course when the loud clatter of a serving dish crashing to the floor makes me jump out of my seat. I face the clumsy servant but words fail me as I discover the dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand.

I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice is deep, tinted with a strange accent. It rises to a loud shout, "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" The afternoon sun is reflected in the raised dagger, blinding me as [assassin.GetSheHe] stabs downwards.

No one escapes [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s judgment, or the Assassins. There is nowhere to run. Nothing within reach to use as a weapon. [assassin.GetSheHeCap] points the dagger at me, and says solemnly: "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."

I grasp for the dagger under my pillow, but the shock of this unexpected visit has made my fingers stiff and movement imprecise. Before I can find it, the hooded figure is upon me. A dagger glints in the faint moonlight. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."

The time has come for the judgment of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]! The guests fall silent as the [assassin.GetManWoman]'s shout echoes through the hall. A flash of gleaming metal, and then blood, pouring from between my fingers. A soft whisper as the world grows dim: "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."

No one escapes [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s judgment, or the Assassins. The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice is deep, solemn. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." The moonlight reflects in the dagger as [assassin.GetSheHe] raises it over her head. I close my eyes.

It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. As if [plot_target.GetSheHe] was a sheep, I herded [plot_target.GetHerHim] into the midst of the crowd, where everyone would see. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" I shouted, raising my dagger. Those who saw will never forget.

Due to my extensive preparations, entering the prison of [plot_target.Host.GetTitledFirstName] was almost too easy. The burly jailer had fallen asleep – one less death tonight, it seemed – but [plot_target.GetFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]."

[plot_target.GetFirstName] woke with a jerk as I slid through the window, scanning the room with a wild look on [plot_target.GetHerHis] face. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]," I whispered and [plot_target.GetHerHis] head snapped towards the shadowy corner where I stood. [plot_target.GetSheHeCap] reached for something – a weapon, perhaps – but [plot_target.GetSheHe] was not nearly quick enough.

Thanks to my servant's disguise I approached [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] unnoticed. [plot_target.GetHerHisCap] courtiers were loud and jolly, doing their best to forget the misery outside the [plot_target.GetCapitalHolding] walls. As I raised my voice and drew my dagger, however, they all fell silent. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!"

Once I had reached [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s [plot_target.GetChamber], my task became almost too easy. The feeble [plot_target.GetManWoman] could do nothing to defend [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself], if [plot_target.GetSheHe] was even aware of what was about to happen. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." The moonlight reflected in my dagger as I raised it above my head.

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It is done. [plot_target.GetTitledName] is dead. Everything went according to plan and no one will be able to track [plot_target.GetHerHis] death back to you.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]

I am here to carry out [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice rises to a loud shout, "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" As I attempt to deflect the dagger, I manage to tear off [assassin.GetHerHis] mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.

No one escapes [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s judgment, or the Assassins. There is no where to run. Nothing within reach to use as a weapon. So I shout. As [assassin.GetManWoman] launches [assassin.GetHerselfHimself] at me and in my attempt to defend myself I tear [assassin.GetHerHis] mask off, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.

I shout as loud as I can. There are voices on the other side of the door, someone trying to tear it open, but they are too late. When the assassin launches [assassin.GetHerselfHimself] at me, I manage to tear off [assassin.GetHerHis] mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.

[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]! As the assassin raises [assassin.GetHerHis] dagger, I grasp for anything within my reach, something to defend myself with. As the weapon tears my flesh I manage to pull down [assassin.GetHerHis] hood, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.

My feeble cries seems to have alerted the guards, but they are too slow. "No one escapes [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s judgment, or the Assassins. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." As [assassin.GetSheHe] raises the dagger, I struggle and manage to tear off the assassin's mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.

At first, everything went according to plan. It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. However, when the time came to strike, my victim managed to tear of my mask, revealing my face to everyone around us. While it did not save [plot_target.GetHerHim], I almost did not escape.

The burly jailer had fallen asleep, but [plot_target.GetFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. [plot_target.GetSheHeCap] launched [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself] at me, tearing of my mask. My blade slid easily between [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s ribs, but not before [plot_target.GetSheHe] could scream. I barely managed to escape.

[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] woke with a jerk, scanning the room with a wild look on [plot_target.GetHerHis] face. "Guards!" [plot_target.GetSheHe] shouted, panic in [plot_target.GetHerHis] voice. I could hear movements in the adjacent room, and though they were too slow to save [plot_target.GetFirstName], they almost managed to catch me.

[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] was holding a feast that night. While I managed to approach [plot_target.GetFirstName] unnoticed, [plot_target.GetSheHe] managed to tear off my hood, revealing my face to [plot_target.GetHerHis] entire court. I ended [plot_target.GetHerHim] nonetheless, but was almost caught in the process.

When I entered [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s [plot_target.GetChamber] and saw that feeble wretch sleeping in [plot_target.GetHerHis] bed I grew careless. How could this possibly go wrong? However, as I bent over [plot_target.GetFirstName], [plot_target.GetSheHe] opened [plot_target.GetHerHis] eyes and screamed. In the following struggle, my mask was torn off. While my dagger found its target, the guards got a good look at my face before I escaped.

As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your wish has been fulfilled – the despicable [plot_target.GetTitledName] is dead. Unfortunately, however, there was an incident. My identity was discovered and I fear they can track the killing back to you, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. I am most sorry.

Praised be [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap],
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]

I am here to carry out [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]! The [assassin.GetManWoman] on top of me pulls a dagger from [assassin.GetHerHis] robes. I lunge for it, hitting it out of [assassin.GetHerHis] hand. I shout, drawing the attention of the crowd, and within heartbeats my assailant and I are separated.
